title: Strong-Willed
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||[[Willpower]]+||You are resistant to hostile enchantments.
|-
|2||Willpower++||You are highly resistant to hostile enchantments.
|-
|3||Willpower+++||You are extremely resistant to the effects of hostile enchantments.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}[[Category:Mutations]][[Category:Good Mutations]]<noinclude>
==History==
*Prior to [[0.26]], all sources of willpower were called Magic Resistance.
